DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study aim evaluate effectiveness intravenous lidocaine injection relief pain patient undergoing thyroidectomy . A total 56 patient randomized one two group ( group C group I ) base Excel number generation . Patients group C receive normal saline intravenous injection , patient group I receive intravenous bolus injection 1.5mg/kg lidocaine follow continuous lidocaine infusion 2mg/kg/hr . Visual analogue scale pain score , fentanyl consumption , frequency patient push button ( FPB ) patient-controlled analgesia system , presence absence nausea vomit record 2,4,8,12,24,48 hour postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Intravenous Lidocaine Pain After Thyroidectomy
DOC.criteria: Total thyroidectomy mental change allergy local anesthetic
